description.value:
Whenever wearer makes a Fear Test, they can spend a Fate Point to automatically pass with 1d5 Degrees of Success Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Medal will look like another service medal, but have a silver skull etched somewhere on it. It is awarded in secret.

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Kill a Chaos Space Marine

Effect: Special

Notes: -
